summary: This plugin adds new sword to the Skyrim. Base Damage of this blade grows proportionally to the number of killed enemies. Also there is small chance that the next blow you might become mad for 8 sec.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b]Description:[/b][/size]

This plugin adds new sword to the Skyrim. Base Damage of this blade grows proportionally to the number of killed enemies. Also there is small chance that the next blow you might become mad for 8 sec. To get that sword, you should defeat old Imperial officer (Graveyard near Refugees\' Rest - a dilapidated tower east of Windhelm and close to the Morrowind border).

[size=5][b]Info:[/b][/size]

- I used model & textures from from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3871/?]\"Weapons of the Third Era\" plugin[/url], thanks a lot, 747823!
- Only BASE damage grows. Therefor, all effects which improoves one-handed skill and also will improove additional damage of the sword.
- You can\'t disenchant / improove it. It\'s not a bug.
- You can use MCM-menu to castomize the sword
- Power of the blade decreases with time, with no feeding (option)
- Power of the blade lightly increases, by killing the weak creatures (option)
- There is \'bastard\' version (you can use only 1 version of the mod)

[b][size=5]Requirements:[/size][/b]

Skyrim 1.9.32.0
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE 1.6.15[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863]SkyUI 4.0[/url]

[size=5][b]Installing:[/b][/size]

Just copy files from archive to your Skyrim\\Data folder and activate mod in SkyrimLauncher

[size=5][b]May be, I\'ll do it some day:[/b][/size]

May be, I\'ll do it some day

- Now you can catch a soul using Soul Trap Spell and Old Sword. It contradicts the idea of my mod.
- quest for the Old Men as follower
- finish new unique model (mb... other time)
- more enchantments (optional)
- more \'madness\'
- voice of the blade 
- Highwayman for Skyrim.

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=153671973]Steam Version[/url]
[url=http://tesall.ru/files/file/5050-%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%8B%D0%B9-%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%87/]Russian version + description[/url]
author: sh4d0ff
